recommendations: Abigail Hughes
Licensed Broker and Owner of  Embark Worldwide Insurance Group.
April 21, 2013, Abigail was a client of Jay D.’s

With exuberance and a zest for life, Jay guides you to question your life, your decisions, your objectives.  He helps you understand how to connect with life's goals, get on the path that life wants you to take and soar personally, professionally, and spiritually.  You will learn a great deal!!

Jo Carey
Executive Assistant,  Project Management, Event Management + Programming + Coordination + Facilitation
November 14, 2012, Jo worked with Jay D. but at different companies

Through all the years of producing events at the Bodhi Tree, I met many outstanding presenters, but only a few truly extraordinary teachers. I feel that Jay is emerging as one of the most accessible and transformative teachers of spirituality today. His sincerity and clarity disarms defenses and negativity to create a space in which people can connect the dots and want to make the shift from "get to give" and "ego to Higher Self." ~ Jo Carey, Events Manager, Bodhi Tree Bookstore

Sheetal Elangovan
UI/UX Designer seeking Full time opportunities in Orange County, CA
March 7, 2016, Jay D. was a client of Sheetal’s

Sheetal is professional, talented, and provides excellent customer service with her ability to communicate and translate ideas/concepts into what is needed and produce a fantastic product.  I appreciate her follow through, talent and for truly caring that her client is excited about the design. Sheetal provided exactly what I had been looking for and even more as she provided excellent ideas and problem solving, along with great design skills to allow for creativity and innovation to bring ideas to life... She chose a platform that was best suited to my needs and was patient as I was learning about squarespace,  and took the time to explain my options as well as with design/content until we were both satisfied. Sheetal also made sure that I knew how to make adjustments myself for future content and updates. I would highly recommend Sheetal and I look forward to working with her on other design projects.

Joann Lim Lesiuczok
Designer. Catalyst. Connoisseur of Life.
November 28, 2011, Jay D. worked with Joann but at different companies

Joann is a special person who knows how to help people GIVE the most to life. Her inspirational presence, wisdom and unique way of "seeing" life is truly amazing! She is an example of what it means to live life on purpose,  with passion and sincerity, and with true intention to serve the world. It is truly an honor to know this incredible connoisseur of life and I highly recommend her to anyone who is committed to exploring and experiencing their full potential!

summary: Founder of Humans For Giving - Leading the Evolution for a World of ChangeKeynote Speaker, Author and Seminar Leader HUMANS FOR GIVING is committed to altering the path of the current inequalities and unsustainable conditions in society today with an all-inclusive approach that helps others to see that we are all teammates in life, members of one race – the Human Race... To consciously lead and evolve, we must be fully aware of what we are evolving to... What we are all "In Training" and "In Healing" for...  Great leaders of positive influence have always been students of life with an insatiable desire to learn and expand with a deep curiosity to explore the spiritual meaning of life and what it means to fulfill our highest potential...In The Evolution of Leadership, the ultimate success is fulfilling the purpose for which we have been specifically designed in alignment with our divine nature and souls mission...				http://www.humansinhealing.comhttp://wakeupworldtour.com Author:Humans In Training - Evolution of the Soul,Humans In Healing - Expansion of Consciousness,Humans For Giving - Evolution of Leadership,Programs:Soul ExpansionEvolution of HealingEvolution of Leadership
